ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] Happy Mother's Day
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you!  I made 45 and 3/5ths last night.  Was hoping the family would be more cooperative in my playing today, but no.  And the thunderstorms keep
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you! I made 45 and 3/5ths last night. Was hoping the family
would be more cooperative in my playing today, but no. And the
thunderstorms keep disconnecting our server's modem. I get new
spells at 46. You should come by Burning Woods and PL me sometime!
:-)

Got irritated today. A groupie complained about me talking too
much. I was not talking a lot.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 5/11/03 at Beverly wrote:

____Happy Mother Day Everyone!!!
____



*************************
The way you know if you need magnesium is your brain doesn't stop
working at bedtime. The way you know if you need B6 is you don't
remember your dreams.
